feed.title: Player 2 Games
feed.subtitle: A podcast about video game news, history, and opinions. Hosted by Kirk and Luke.

entry.title: Simulated
entry.content: Please help us welcome Simulated, our very first guest on the podcast! After some quick news updates, we go deep to find out who Simulated is, where he came from, and how he got so successful! Tune in to hear his story!
entry.summary: Please help us welcome Simulated, our very first guest on the podcast! After some quick news updates, we go deep to find out who Simulated is, where he came from, and how he got so successful! Tune in to hear his story!
